title: Chris Burnell
tagline:
Hey, my name’s Chris,
and I’m ravenous for CSS.
description: I’m Chris Burnell, a Canadian Front End Developer hailing from Halifax, Nova Scotia now living in London, England. Right now I’m working for Squiz as a Lead Developer, helping organise London Web Standards and State of the Browser, and I’m perpetually rabbit-hole deep-diving. This is where I think, write, and share my passion for the web.
